駹字的基本解释

駹
máng
青色的马。
杂色的牲口：“用駹可也。”

駹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［máng］
［《廣韻》莫江切，平江，明。］
(1)面、额白色的黑马。
(2)青色马。
(3)杂色。
(4)指杂色牲。
(5)古部族名。汉武帝时以其地置汶山郡，在今四川省阿坝藏族羌族自治州茂县和汶川、理县一带。

駹字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駹； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1439第12
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?莫江切，音厖。【玉篇】馬黑白毛也。【爾雅·釋畜】面顙皆白惟駹。【前漢·匈奴傳】圍高帝於白登，漢兵不得相救。匈奴騎，其西方盡白，東方盡駹，北方盡驪，南方盡騂。【註】駹，靑馬也。　又【周禮·秋官·犬人】用駹可也。【註】駹謂不純色也。【疏】謂雜色牲。　又國名。【史記·西南夷傳】冉駹最大。【註】應劭讀龎。　又水名。【華陽國志】汶江道，濊水駹水出焉。

駹字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
駹字的起名意思

暂无。

Partridge
Basic explanation of words
Partridge
máng
Cyan horse.
Variegated animals: "You can use partridges."
Partridge
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [máng]
["Guangyun" Mo Jiangqie, Pingjiang, Ming. ]
(1) Black horse with white face and forehead.
(2) Cyan horse.
(3) Variety.
(4) Refers to variegated animals.
(5) Ancient tribe name. When Emperor Wu of the Han Dynasty placed its place in Wenshan County, it was in Maoxian County, Wenchuan and Li County of Aba Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture in Sichuan Province.
Partridge
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　駹; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1439 No. 12
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Mo Jiangqie, Yin Pang. [Jade articles] Horses are also black and white. 【Erya·Shiyu】The face is white but partridges. [Previous Han · Xiongnu Biography] Encircling Gaodi in Baideng, the Han soldiers could not save each other. The Xiongnu rides, its west is full of whiteness, east is full of partridges, north is full of spirits, and south is full of spirits. 【Note】Partridge, 靑马 also.　[Zhou Li·Qiuguan·Dogren] can also be used with partridges. 【Note】Partridge means impure color. 【Sparse】It is called variegated animal.　 Also the name of the country. [Historical Records · Southwestern Yi Biography] Ranzha is the largest. 【Note】Ying Shao Read Ping.　Also known as water. [Huayang Guozhi] Wenjiang Road, sip water out of Yan.
